full_text: 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate col- umn to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) NAME OF PERSON WHOLLY PARTIALLY DEPENDENT DEPENDENT AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME RauL DeRaT 58 HUSBanD 6. son(s): (To filled in, if appropriate.) That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following per- Name Date submitted Raul Derat 3/27/90 7. (To be filled in, if appropriate.) That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service, on behalf of the following person(s): Name Relationship Date submitted RaUL Derat HUSBAND 12/23/70 8. That I am willing and able to receive, maintain, and support the persons listed in item 3 above. That I am ready and willing to deposit a bond, if necessary, with the Immigration and Naturalization Service to guarantee that such persons will not become public charges during their stay in the United States. 9. That this affidavit is made by me for the purpose of assuring the Immigration and Naturalization Service that the above-named persons will not become public charges in the United States. 10. That my reasons for signing this affidavit are: Execution of affidavit. You must sign the affidavit in your full, true, and correct name and affirm or make it under oath. Signature of person preparing form, if other than deponent In the United States the affidavit may be sworn to or affirmed before an immigration officer without the payment of fee, or be- I declare that this document was prepared by me at the fore a notary public or other officer authorized to administer request of the deponent and is based on all information oaths for general purposes, in which case the official seal or certificate of authority to administer oaths must be affixed. of which I have any knowledge. Outside the United States the affidavit must be sworn to or affirmed before a United States consular or immigration officer. Address: SIGNATURE "Barmen Guary Date: Derat 1053 West 89st SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS 3/27/70 27th th day of march A.D. 19 70 Garmen Jun Dent (Signature of deponent) at Loo Angele Calif DESIGNATED TO ADMINISTER Marie la Torre OATHS 8 CFR 287.t (Signature of offices) (Title of officer) Nature of Evidence of Net Worth To Be Submitted.- The deponent must submit in duplicate evidence of net worth as follows: 1. Statement from asi officer-of the bank, postal or other financial institution in which you have deposits giving the following details re- arding your bank account: (1) Date account opened, (2) Total amount deposited for past year, (3) Present balance. stement of employer, preferably his business stationery, showing: (1) Date and nature of employment, (2) Salary paid, (3) Whether position temporary or permanent. 3. If self-employed: (1) Copy of last income tax return filed or (2) report of commercial rating concern. 4. List contr serial number and denomination of bonds and name of purchaser.
